Package core.notify

Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com Utils to notify the running state of the program

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NotifyListener<T extends NotifyMessage>
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com The listener of notify message
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MSGAddedSource
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com MSG: the new source has added into root
    MSGAddingSource
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com MSG: start adding new source into root
    MSGBlockDCMStartNew
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com MSG: block dcm start to compress a new block
    MSGDCMCompressNew
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com MSG: DCM start to compress a new file
    MSGDCMDecompressNew
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com MSG: DCM start to decompress a new job
    MSGDCMDecompressNewFile
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com MSG: DCM start to decompress a new file
    MSGDecompressDone
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com MSG: DCM has decompressed all jobs
    MSGDumpedIndex
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com MSG: DCM start to dump index
    MSGDumpingIndex
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com MSG: DCM is dumping index
    MSGLoadedIndex
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com MSG: DCM loaded index
    MSGLoadingIndex
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com MSG: DCM is loading index
    MSGTarBuildingIndex
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com MSG: Tar is building index
    Notifier
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com Notifier is used to distribute notify messages into listeners SINGLETON
    NotifyMessage
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com The abstract notify message
    NotifyThread
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com The thread to run notifier SINGLETON
